mapper.insert: INSERT INTO board ( user_no, title, contents, created_datetime, hit_cnt ) VALUES ( #{userNo}, #{title}, #{contents}, NOW(), 0 )
mapper.select: SELECT board_idx, title, contents, hit_cnt, created_datetime FROM board WHERE board_idx = #{boardIdx}
mapper.update: UPDATE board SET title = #{title}, contents = #{contents}, updated_datetime = Now() WHERE board_idx = #{boardIdx}
